project.name: Manifold :: CoreParent
project.description: Manifold plugins into Java and supplements it with powerful features, including Type-safe Metaprogramming, Extension Methods, Operator Overloading, Unit Expressions, Java Template Engine, Preprocessor, and more. All fully supported in Java 8 - 13 with comprehensive support in IntelliJ IDEA. Simply add Manifold to your existing project and begin taking advantage of it.
